setBalance(double) - Method in class com.vmworld.entity.Account
Sets the initial balance of the account after performing a validation check
setCustomerId(int) - Method in class com.vmworld.entity.Customer
Sets the customer ID.
setCustomerName(String) - Method in class com.vmworld.entity.Customer
Sets the customer's name with validation
Name must not be null and must have at least 3 non-whitespace characters.
setMobileNumber(long) - Method in class com.vmworld.entity.Customer
Sets the mobile number with validation.
Must be a valid 10-digit Inidan mobile number.
setTimestamp(String) - Method in class com.vmworld.entity.Transaction
Sets the timestamp of the transaction.

Sets the type of transaction.
startBankingApp() - Method in class com.vmworld.controller.BankingController
Starts the main banking application loop.
Displays menu and processes user choices until exit.
Handles exceptions gracefully and continues execution.
